description:
She infiltrates Hakuhou Girls` Academy`s High School division under the guise of a school nurse. However, she is actually a veteran who has served as the doctor for the Bentenmaru since the time http://anidb.net/ch37528 [Ririka] was still actively working on board. She teaches http://anidb.net/ch35552 [Marika] how to prepare for her role as the ship`s captain.
Source: Official Site
name: Misa Grandwood
